item.title: About Me
item.description:
Hi, I’m Swayam

Welcome to my little corner of the internet! I’m a passionate learner and creator with a love for all things science, technology, and creativity. From exploring the mysteries of astrophysics to diving into the logic of mathematics and robotics, I’m captivated by how the universe works and how we can shape it through innovation.

As a developer, I enjoy programming and building applications. Currently, I’m developing a project that combines Flask for backend development with React on the frontend, bridging technology and user experience seamlessly.
item.content:
Hi, I’m Swayam

Welcome to my little corner of the internet! I’m a passionate learner and creator with a love for all things science, technology, and creativity. From exploring the mysteries of astrophysics to diving into the logic of mathematics and robotics, I’m captivated by how the universe works and how we can shape it through innovation.

As a developer, I enjoy programming and building applications. Currently, I’m developing a project that combines Flask for backend development with React on the frontend, bridging technology and user experience seamlessly.

Outside of coding, I’m an avid reader, a fan of anime, and a movie enthusiast. I also enjoy music and the art of storytelling, finding inspiration in every form of creativity.

Curiosity fuels me, and I’m always looking to expand my knowledge, whether it’s through books, new projects, or exploring the vast realms of science and technology.

Let’s connect and explore the infinite possibilities together!
